comments:
Here is the scenario:
1. User creates Java project and a java class "MyClass" within this project.
2. User 'dirties' the editor containing the java class.
3. User deletes the Java project
4. User closes workbench
5. Save Resources dialog box pops-up -> user decides not to save the file containing java class and clicks "OK"
PROBLEM:
1. Even though user decided not to save the file, the following dialog box pops-up before workbench closes:
"Could not save workbench layout. Reason: Problems occured saving workbench."
Details:
"Unable to save perspective: Workspace - Java.
Unable to save editor: MyClass.java."
2. On restarting workbench the following error box pops-up:
"Could not restore workbench layout. Reason: Problems occured restoring workbench."
Details:
"Unable to restore perspective: Workspace - Java.
Unable to create editor: MyClass.java"

This problems spans accross all types of files in all perspectives. It is not specific to Java Perspective only. We do experience the same problem in Websphere Integration Developer.

Best Regards!

Kris Kobylinski
IBM Toronto Laboratory   
kobylin@ca.ibm.com         
Phone: (905) 413-3468 T/L:969-3468          
Fax: (905) 413-4920 T/L:969-4920
Is there anything in the <workspace>/.metadata/.log file?
Did you try to reproduce this with a more recent version of Eclipse? I was not able to reproduce this using 3.2.

On shutting down the following exception is being thrown:

I haven't try to reproduce this with any newer versions since this bug was discovered from within Websphere Integration Developer 6.0.2 so we are limited as to what Eclipse version we use.
I don't think we can fix this for you on an old version.

Created an attachment (id=49875)
patch against 3.0.2 (Revision 1.47.2.2 of EditorManager.java)

This patch should fix the problem you describe.  Please let me know if you need anything else from me.
Still marking as wontfix since we are not doing any development on the 3.0.x stream.
The patch has been released to the R3_0_maintenance branch, and the version number of the containing plug-in org.eclipse.ui.workbench was bumped to 3.0.2.5.
